extendedInfo.description: Make SMS & Whatsapp & Line more fun and interesting. This app features a collection of 30+ stylish fonts for messaging, Line & Whatsaapp. You can also use these fonts for other apps like Gmail, Free SMS etc.Over 30 different 30+ stylish fonts for messaging, which can be used everywhere you can type a message (Email,SMS, social networking apps, Whatsapp, Line, Twitter, Facebook, Kik, Kakaotalk, Wechat, sina weiboâ¦)(WORKS ON ALL APPS!)Be one of the first to get it and surprise your friends with a text message written in Cool Fonts ;)No additional app is needed for using these fonts. Just download "Cool Fonts" and make texting funnier.You can share this app with friends and family so they can also chat in "Cool Fonts".This app is supported by advertisements. Ads keep this app free for everyone to enjoy. reviews.title: Hi Developer
reviews.comment: This app is cool... But Zoner AntiVirus Mark this app is a Adware... Can u fix this? Thanks...
reviews.author: Ivan Triplesix

reviews.comment: I love the fonts but it doesn\'t work for Instagram!!! I would rate this app five stars if it was compatible with Instagram. Also, a few more fonts would be nice, but still a pretty good app. JUST PLEASE MAKE IT WORK FOR INSTAGRAM. PLEASEPLEASEPLEASE.
reviews.author: Kelsie Strobel

reviews.title: cool.
reviews.comment: HEY EVERYONE. here is how you can make it go on instagram: 1.)write whatever you want. 2.)select your font. 3.)click sms. 4.)copy your text. 5.)paste it to your picture/bio/or whatever. Hope this helped. =]

reviews.title: Amazing
